page.title: 14DAILY LIFE
page.content: Amid the noise and bustle of traffic along the Hagley Road stands the Oratory House.Father Michael is one of the Oratory Fathers who live there.His day begins at 6.00 a.m. with the ringing of a bell calling the Oratory Fathers to prayer.Father Michael will then say Mass before eating breakfast.His day is spent visiting local Catholic schools,the children's hospital and old people's homes offering advice and comfort,a friendly word and a story for the children.Father Michael also spends some of his time in the evening visiting people who are ill or in need of a chat or advice in their homes. Between 8 and 10 p.m.Father Michael is to be found in his simply furnished room at the Oratory House.At 10.00 p.m. the bell rings again,silence falls and it is time for prayer.
